00032 
00033 template <class Type>
00034 inline Type*
00035 cloneObjWithMemMgr(const Type& other, MemoryManagerType& theManager)
00036 {
00037 
00038     XalanMemMgrAutoPtr<Type, false> theGuard( theManager , (Type*)theManager.allocate(sizeof(Type)));
00039 
00040     Type* theResult = theGuard.get();
00041 
00042     new (theResult) Type(other, theManager);
00043 
00044     theGuard.release();
00045     
00046     return theResult;
00047 }
00048 
00049 
00050 
00051 template <class Type>
00052 inline Type*
00053 cloneObj(const Type& other, MemoryManagerType& theManager)
00054 {
00055 
00056     XalanMemMgrAutoPtr<Type, false> theGuard( theManager , (Type*)theManager.allocate(sizeof(Type)));
00057 
00058     Type* theResult = theGuard.get();
00059 
00060     new (theResult) Type(other);
00061 
00062     theGuard.release();
00063     
00064     return theResult;
00065 }
00066 
00067 
00068 
00069 template <class Type>
00070 class CreateObjFunctor
00071 {
00072 public:
00073     Type*
00074     operator()(MemoryManagerType& theManager)
00075     {
00076         
00077         XalanMemMgrAutoPtr<Type, false> theGuard( theManager , (Type*)theManager.allocate(sizeof(Type)));
00078         
00079         Type* theResult = theGuard.get();
00080         
00081         new (theResult) Type(theManager);
00082         
00083         theGuard.release();
00084         
00085         return theResult;
00086     }
00087 };
00088 
00089 template <class Type>
00090 inline void
00091 destroyObjWithMemMgr(const Type* ptr, MemoryManagerType& theManager)
00092 {
00093     if (ptr != 0)
00094     {
00095         Type* const     nonConstPointer =
00096 #if defined(XALAN_OLD_STYLE_CASTS)
00097             (const Type*)ptr;
00098 #else
00099             const_cast<Type*>(ptr);
00100 #endif
00101         nonConstPointer->~Type();
00102 
00103         theManager.deallocate(nonConstPointer);
00104     }
00105 }
